title: Elasticsearch Was Great, But Vector Databases Are the Future
author: Jiang Chen
description: Purpose-built vector databases outperform dual-system setups by unifying the Sparse-BM25 algorithm and semantic search in a single, efficient operation.
cntitle: Elasticsearch很好，但向量数据库才是未来
cndescription: 专为向量数据库设计的系统，通过在一个高效的操作中统一 Sparse-BM25 算法和语义搜索，性能优于双系统设置。
